
Subject: Deletion of your shared hosting account

Hello %%%FIRST_NAME%%%,

Your shared hosting account with login %%%DTC_ADM_LOGIN%%% has expired
%%%EXPIRED_DAYS%%% days ago, on the: %%%EXPIRATION_DATE%%%.

We sent you some messages already to ask you to renew and you didn't do
it. We are sorry but we have to shutdown your account today and erase
the datas of your account to have the space available for other
customers.

%%%SIGNATURE%%%
